title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in win32 uses Class.forName() which can cause performance issues and potential ClassNotFoundExceptions.
EB: The BidiUtil class in win32 should be modified to use the direct instantiation of the class instead of Class.forName().
SR: To fix the issue, change the following line: static Callback callback = new Callback (new BidiUtil().getClass(), 'windowProc', 4);
